import React, { Component, useState } from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; class NavBar extends React.Component { render() { const [username, setusername] = useState(useSelector(state => state.user.username)) return (
Myspace
  • Home
  • Friends
  • Login
  • Register
  • {username}
  • Register
) } } export default NavBar;
